attributes.action: SAVE THE LONDON BBC TAMIL BROADCAST
attributes.additional_details:
The BBC has decided to close down its popular Tamil Language Broadcast  “ThamilOsai” from London  and transfer the entire operation to New Delhi, early in 2015, after serving for nearly 74 years,  arguing that they do not have funds to continue the service from London.  It is on the brink of losing its independence and efficiency.

Stop the Move
There are many more reasons to save the LONDON BBC TAMIL SERVICE

rejection.details: What programmes the BBC runs is decided by the BBC Trust, which is seperate from Government.
